## Current Operations Budget
@tbl-brbudget22 lays our our FY22 operations budget. The mayor proposed a 4,317,000 increase in our budget. After meeting with property owners through several homeowner's associations and rotary club meetings, we have prioritized code enforcement in our allocation of the new funds. We have also increased our staffing for proposal review after consultation with local developers and construction companies.
